topic_name: Projectile Motion: Maximum Height, Range, Time of Flight, Maximum Angle

mcqs.question: Question 1 related to Projectile Motion: Maximum Height, Range, Time of Flight, Maximum Angle
mcqs.explanation: This question tests understanding of Calculate, using equations of uniformly accelerated motion for a given initial velocity of a frictionless projectile: maximum height, horizontal range, position after a given time, time in air, parameters for a projectile launched from ground height, launch angle for maximum range, and relation between launch angles that result in the same range
mcqs.learning_outcome: Calculate, using equations of uniformly accelerated motion for a given initial velocity of a frictionless projectile: maximum height, horizontal range, position after a given time, time in air, parameters for a projectile launched from ground height, launch angle for maximum range, and relation between launch angles that result in the same range
